highlights: Worked with sales, operations’ support, and product management to create a web portal for data visualization and access using Flask, Bokeh, and Pandas, enabling rapid, data-driven decision-making.
Assisted with modelling of vehicle faults using NetworkX graphs.
Manage 8+ person team, managing deadlines, project assignments, and mission objectives.
Run weekly meetings and project retrospectives.
Sysadmin all Linux machines for the club.
Redesign all flight subsystems to follow client-server RPC model.
Create and maintain club’s provisioning and container infrastructure.
Enhance algorithm that geolocates ground targets using aerial imagery.
Designed three websites, using the Bootstrap web framework, for the three divisions of Raleigh Vending with Kasimir Schulz.
Regularly met with company owners to demo progress.

projects.name: Cookbook
projects.description: Create CLI and RESTful webserver produce high quality LaTeX, PDF, and HTML documents from recipes specified via YAML/JSON. Learn about modern web service and software-as-a-service design. Deploy webserver via containers and distribute software via Go modules.

projects.name: SBGC Serial API Rewrite
projects.description: Rewrote BaseCam Electronics C/C++ Serial API to provide a higher-level API, wrap that higher-level API in Python, create unit tests, document code, and standardize code style.

projects.name: TweeterBot
projects.description: Created a Twitter bot that randomly tweeted a sentence using a hand-crafted JSON dictionary, making sure that basic grammar rules were followed. Deployed on a Raspberry Pi using cron for scheduling and Pipenv for Python dependency management.

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: Created my personal website using Jekyll and Marx CSS, self hosted via Docker Swarm at my house. Fully maintain the website, the SSL certificates, and the network infrastructure required to run the website.
